dict.acceptation: 想( think的过去式和过去分词)；思索；以为；认为；

sent.orig: I thought a thought. But the thought I thought wasn't the thought I thought I thought.
sent.trans: 我思考一个问题。可是，我所思考的问题并不是我认为自己正在思考的问题。

sent.orig: But the thought I thought wasn't the thought I thought I thought.
sent.trans: 可是，我所思考的问题并不是我认为自己正在思考的问题。

sent.orig: Early Christianity fraternity thought is the first fraternity thought comparatively in the world history.
sent.trans: 早期基督教“博爱”思想，是人类历史上第一个较为明确完整的博爱思想。

sent.orig: The value of manage rest with thought, but the strength of the thought consist an activity.
sent.trans: 管理的价值在于思想，而思想的力量在于行动。

sent.orig: Limited government idea of Lock, in human politics thought, law on thought history, produced-reaching historical effect.
sent.trans: 洛克的有限政府思想，在人类政治思想、法律思想史上，产生了深远的历史影响。
